name: Rainbow Fall
description:
[CONTROLS]

ARROWS, WASD - Move left and right

LEFT MOUSE, TOUCH - Move left and right by clicking on either side of the screen

[DESCRIPTION]

Be a cool and pixelated slime ball falling in an endless dark pit. Your goal is to pass through each block row, matching the colours and earning points. But be extra careful while hitting the arrow blocks, they pull you to the sides and mistakes can be made!

[DEVELOPERS]

Daniela Lacerda

Gabriela Moura

Gustavo Vilella

Leonardo Lopes

Vitor Barbosa
